title: DragonOil (Black, Yellow, Red)
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Black, yellow and red marker on white tracing paper
description: Design for logo. The word DRAGONOIL in thick, san-serif block capital letters placed on black rectangle in center of sheet. The word dragon is iin yellow; oil is in red. The yellow and red markers are applied on the verso of the sheet.
name: Drawing
